about_the_game:
*This DLC is also included in "Additional Card Pass Vol.2" which is on sale. It is possible to purchase both individual "Additional Card Sets" and "Additional Card Pass Vol.2", but the acquisition of included contents will only be reflected once.

For more details on upcoming cards, please check the latest list for "Additional Card Set Vol.8 [D-SS04]: Stride Deckset -Messiah-" on the Cardfight!! Vanguard Dear Days official website.

【Card List】
D-SS04/001EN Alter Ego Messiah
D-SS04/002EN Awaking Messiah
D-SS04/003EN Asleep Messiah
D-SS04/004EN Neon Messiah
D-SS04/005EN Astrolabe Dragon
D-SS04/006EN Kaluzar Klein
D-SS04/007EN Arrester Messiah
D-SS04/008EN Flowers in Vacuum, Cosmo Wreath
D-SS04/009EN Destiny Dealer
D-SS04/010EN Sacrifice Messiah
D-SS04/011EN Herbig Claw
D-SS04/012EN Star Dragon Deity of Infinitude, Eldobreath
D-SS04/013EN Star Agression Dragon
D-SS04/014EN Aberrant Gleam Dragon
D-SS04/015EN Transforming Heavy Machinery, Heavy Constalion
D-SS04/016EN Alter Rate Sphere Dragon
D-SS04/017EN Genesis Dragon, Excelics Messiah
D-SS04/018EN Genesis Dragon, Amnesty Messiah

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows8.1
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows8.1
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-3770
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
